data.name: MainPageIntro
data.value: Upload Data to GEOMAR Research Center in Kiel

data.name: MainPageIntro2
data.value: 1. Open the KOR-App and import your measurement from a sonde. Export your results to a CSV and select GEOMAR from the list.

data.name: MainPageIntro3
data.value: 2. You will be guided back here. If needed correct the coordinates before sending your data to GEOMAR.

data.name: MainPageIntro4
data.value: Your Mail-App will launched automatically to transmit the data. (If you are prompted to select a File before sending no valid CSV-File was shared from KOR-App.)

data.name: MainPageFileRemoveHint
data.value: Click to remove File and Select a new one.

data.name: MainPageSendButtonHint
data.value: Loads a CSV File and prepares a Mail to send

data.name: FileTooOldAlertText2
data.value: Minutes old. Please manually correct your coordinates if you have sailed away from the measurement spot since than.

data.name: WrongFileLastError
data.value: - File was not readable or wrong format.

data.name: DeveloperNote
data.value:
© 2023 Hinnerk Weiler

Carefully crafted with ♥ for the oceans. Developer contact and technical support:
h.weiler@trans-ocean.org. This Software was developed in best intentions and is provided as is with no warranties. Source code and full license Information is available on the developer page.

data.name: AboutText
data.value:
Be part of the research

Citizen Science:Sailing for Oxygen is a joint project initiated by the german research center GEOMAR and Trans-Ocean sailing club. This companion app assists you in becoming part of the project and helps you transmit your samples to scientists worldwide.

For more information please visit the project website sail4oxygen.org. Technical Support is available via developer contact details and the end of this screen.

data.name: PrivacyText
data.value: Privacy Note: In order to transmit your data to GEOMAR we use E-Mail. Your Message will reveal your location at time of sampling data and your personal email address on our servers. The public available data will be anonymised and does not contain any personal information. Responsible for data privacy of stored Data is the GEOMAR Research center .

data.name: OnboardingPageComeBackInfo
data.value: You can come back here any time later from the About page.

data.name: OnboardingGreetingText
data.value: Great having you on board to do Citizen Science and help us to understand the oceans!

data.name: OnboardingAuthCode
data.value: If you are already have a confirmation code please enter it here:

data.name: OnboardingKORInfo
data.value: To fully get on board with your research please set up the KOR-App you also will needed the KOR App to download data from our sonde. We are in touch to solve this dependency with the manufactuerer for future versions.

data.name: NoCsvFile
data.value: No file selected. Export one from KOR App.

data.name: NoFileAlertText
data.value: file not opened. Either you canceled the selection or file permission was not granted.

data.name: SendMessageAlertText
data.value: You just did science! Your measurement sould be available to scientists at the GEOMAR Beluga-Portal in a few minutes.

data.name: OnboardingDSGVOInfo
data.value: <em>Wehen transmitting measurements I agree sending my sample data via email to the GEOMAR Research Center, revealing my email address and location at time of measurement. See sail4oxygen.org for further information.

data.name: PrivacyAlertText
data.value: You will not be able to send measurements without consent to our privacy disclaimer.
